page.title: 05PENSIONERS' CLUB GREENOCK
page.content: There is a{pensioners' club}in Aberfoyle Road. Here the old people in the area can have their lunch every weekday at a cost of 45p. The club is funded by the council. 7 people are employed - they cook,serve and clean up. Between 60 - 90 people use the club each day. After their lunch, some of the old people remain behind to play games such as bingo, cards, dominoes, chess and carpet bowls. We interviewed some of the pensioners. All of them agreed that the meals were the {"best"}in Greenock! The pensioners are all very happy with the club because it not only gives them the chance to have a good meal every day, but also the opportunity to meet other people. {We think this is ideal for pensioners}
